dmca.title: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Materials
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: AMPaquette@aol.com [mailto:AMPaquette@aol.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2007 11:20 AM
To: Webmaster@damnfunnypictures.com; DMCA
Subject: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Mr. Barnes:

     Our office represents the L. Ron Hubbard Library, the owner of the
copyright to a
video work entitled "Orientation."  This work is registered with the
United States
Copyright Office under registration number PA 804-464.

     We have been notified that a copy of this copyrighted work has been
placed on
your website without our client's authorization.  The URLs where this
work can be found
are:

     http://www.planetvids.com/html/Scientology-Orientation-Film.html
 
http://www.planetvids.com/planetvids/ScientologyOrientationFilm_01.flv

     Under 17 U.S.C.  106, it is unlawful to reproduce or distribute
someone else's
copyrighted work without that person's authorization.   Accordingly, I
am asking for
your help in removing this copyrighted work from your service.
     
     I have a good faith belief, and in fact know for certain, that the
posting of this
work through your system was not authorized by my client, any agent of
my client, or
the law.

     I declare under penalty of perjury that this information is
accurate and that I am
authorized to act on behalf of the L. Ron Hubbard Library in this
matter.

     I appreciate your help and prompt attention to this matter.  


Sincerely,
Ava Paquette
Moxon & Kobrin
3055 Wilshire Boulevard
Suite 900
Los Angeles, California 90010
Tel: (213) 487-4468
Fax: (213) 487-5385
